languages.text: "Спроси про Амарната. Ты ведь прибыл сюда ради него".
"Ask him about Amarnat. You came here because of him, after all."
languages.original_text: "Спроси про Амарната. Ты ведь прибыл сюда ради него".

traits.locale_text: "Ask him about Amarnat. You came here because of him, after all."
"Ask him about Amarnat. You came here because of him, after all."
"Ask him about Amarnat. You came here because of him, after all."
"Ask him about Amarnat. You came here because of him, after all."
"Ask him about Amarnat. You came here because of him, after all."

languages.text: "Fragt ihn nach Amarnat. Schließlich seid Ihr wegen ihm hier."
languages.original_text: "Ask him about Amarnat. You came here because of him, after all."

traits.locale_text: "Fragt ihn nach Amarnat. Schließlich seid Ihr wegen ihm hier."

languages.text: « Interrogez-le sur Amarnat. Vous êtes venu ici à cause de lui, après tout. »
languages.original_text: "Ask him about Amarnat. You came here because of him, after all."

traits.locale_text: « Interrogez-le sur Amarnat. Vous êtes venu ici à cause de lui, après tout. »

languages.text: “问问他关于阿玛纳特的事情吧，毕竟你是为了那个人才来这里的。”
languages.original_text: "Ask him about Amarnat. You came here because of him, after all."

traits.locale_text: “问问他关于阿玛纳特的事情吧，毕竟你是为了那个人才来这里的。”

languages.text: 「彼にアマルナトのことを尋ねてみるといい。結局のところ、そのためにここへきたのだろう」
languages.original_text: "Ask him about Amarnat. You came here because of him, after all."

traits.locale_text: 「彼にアマルナトのことを尋ねてみるといい。君はそのためにここへきたのだろう、結局のところ」

languages.text: «Pregúntele sobre Amarnat. Después de todo, vino aquí por él».
languages.original_text: "Ask him about Amarnat. You came here because of him, after all."

traits.locale_text: «Pregúntele sobre Amarnat. Después de todo, vino aquí por él".

languages.text: "Ona Amarnat'ı sor. Sonuçta buraya onun için gelmedin mi?"
languages.original_text: "Ask him about Amarnat. You came here because of him, after all."

traits.locale_text: "Ona Amarnat'ı sor. Sonuçta buraya onun için gelmedin mi?"
